messages.content: What is the goal of the ComfyUI-Transformers project?

The goal of ComfyUI-Transformers is to make technology more accessible and engaging by combining the power of computer vision and natural language processing to create intuitive and user-friendly interfaces.
ComfyUI-Transformers offers advanced computer vision algorithms, seamless integration with natural language processing, and high performance and accuracy in user interface transformation.
What dependencies are required to run ComfyUI-Transformers?
To run ComfyUI-Transformers, you need numpy >= 1.26.3, Pillow >= 10.2.0, torch >= 2.1.2, and transformers >= 4.37.1.
What is the installation process for ComfyUI-Transformers?

To install ComfyUI-Transformers, clone the repository and install the required dependencies by running the following commands: `cd custom_nodes ; git clone https://github.com/kadirnar/ComfyUI-Transformers`
Under what license is the ComfyUI-Transformers project released?
The ComfyUI-Transformers project is licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0.
Is the ComfyUI-Transformers project open to contributions?

Yes, ComfyUI-Transformers welcomes contributions from the community. Contributors are requested to read the contribution guidelines before submitting a pull request and adhere to the coding standards.
